properties.description: Set that textbox is a form element         Value: textbox
properties.name: _formelement

properties.description: Textbox automatically get focus when page loads         Values can be: true or false         Default: false
properties.name: autofocus

properties.description: Textbox characters counter         Values can be: simple, maximal or false         Default: false
properties.name: counter

properties.description: Textbox desactivation         Values can be: true or false         Default: false
properties.name: disable

properties.description: Textbox maximum characters number         Value must be int number         Default: valueless
properties.name: maxlength

properties.description: Textbox read only mode         Values can be: true or false         Default: false
properties.name: readonly

properties.description: Textbox type         Values can be: text or password         Default: text
properties.name: type

properties.description: Textbox size respect to container         Value must be number percentage         Default: 50%
properties.name: width

methods.description: Add input textbox value to textbox element
methods.name: _addValue

methods.description: Call functionality when change property value
methods.name: onPropertyChanged

methods.description: set attributes and listeners call to functionality
methods.name: onRender
